name: chat-app
description: Welcome to the **Chat App**, a real-time messaging application built using the **MERN stack** (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) with **Socket.IO** for real-time communication. This app features user authentication, profile updates, and live messaging, making it a great choice for chatting with friends and colleagues.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
